mapper.select:
select
from t_order where 1=1
and ID = #{id}
and orderNo like CONCAT('%',#{orderNo},'%' )
and userId like CONCAT('%',#{userId},'%' )
and count like CONCAT('%',#{count},'%' )
and pill = #{pill}
mapper.insert: insert into t_order(ID, orderNo, userId, count, pill) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pill,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into t_order
ID,
orderNo,
userId,
count,
pill,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{pill,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update t_order
orderNo = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userId = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pill = #{pill,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update t_order set orderNo = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userId = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pill = #{pill,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
